title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Bentangjawa Gravel Race, Indonesia
content:
Photo submitted by Wahyu Wijaya, “Along the way of Bentangjawa, the inaugural 1.500km, 14.000m elevation gain, unsupported West to East Java race. All via the southern route which is very much harder than the flatter northern route. Bentangjawa is the first such unsupported ultra distance race in Indonesia.” We always love seeing photos from where

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Bentangjawa Gravel Race, Indonesia appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
